A

acceptInvite(Invitation) - Method in class database.DatabaseAccess
Method used to change the status of an invitation to "accepted" Procedure: Enables the connection to the database; Sends the command in SQL format; Closes the connection; IF the command has been executed with no issues the method will return "success" and "fail" otherwise
acceptInvite(Invitation) - Method in interface database.DatabaseCon
 
acceptInvite(Invitation) - Method in class model.DatabaseConnectionTier3
References the DatabaseCon variable to change the status of the Invitation parameter in the system to "accepted"; The method returns a string reflecting the success of the procedure;
addItem(Item, Party) - Method in class database.DatabaseAccess
Method used to add an item to a Party; The method verifies first if another instance of the same item, matching in name and price does exists in the system; If yes, the item is then added to the party, if not it is created in tha system and then added; Procedure: Enables the connection to the database; Sends the command in SQL format; Closes the connection; IF the command has been executed with no issues the method will return "success" and "fail" otherwise
addItem() - Method in class database.DatabaseAccessTest
 
addItem(Item) - Method in class domain.Package
Method that adds an item to the List
addItem(Package) - Method in class server.DatabaseConnectionTier2
 
addItems(List<Item>, Party) - Method in class database.DatabaseAccess
Method used to add a List to the Party given as parameter in the database; It calls successively the method addItem for all objects in the list If one add fails the method returns "fail" and aborts the procedure and "success" in the opposite case;
addItems() - Method in class database.DatabaseAccessTest
 
addItems(List<Item>, Party) - Method in interface database.DatabaseCon
 
addItems(List<Item>, Party) - Method in class model.DatabaseConnectionTier3
References the DatabaseCon variable to add the List parameter to the Party parameter in the system; The method returns a string reflecting the success of the procedure;
addItems(Package) - Method in class server.DatabaseConnectionTier2
Calls createSockets() in preparation to sending a Package command; Sends out the package using the ObjectOutputStream variable; The method waits for the result String which it received using the ObjectInputStream variable; The socket connection is closed and the result is being returned.
addItems(Party) - Method in class server.ModelManager
 
addItems(Party) - Method in class server.PartyPlannerService
 
addParticipant(Person, Party) - Method in class database.DatabaseAccess
Method used to add a Person (user) as participant in a Party in the database with mathing characteristics to the Party parameter Enables the connection to the database; Sends the command in SQL format; Closes the connection; IF the command has been executed with no issues the method will return "success" and "fail" otherwise
addParticipant(Package) - Method in class server.DatabaseConnectionTier2
 
addParty(Party) - Method in class domain.Package
Method that adds a party to the List
addPeople(List<Person>, Party) - Method in class database.DatabaseAccess
Method used to add a List to the Party given as parameter in the database; It calls successively the method addParticipant for all objects in the list If one add fails the method returns "fail" and aborts the procedure and "success" in the opposite case;
addPeople(List<Person>, Party) - Method in interface database.DatabaseCon
 
addPeople(List<Person>, Party) - Method in class model.DatabaseConnectionTier3
References the DatabaseCon variable to add the List parameter to the Party parameter in the system; The method returns a string reflecting the success of the procedure;
addPeople(Package) - Method in class server.DatabaseConnectionTier2
Calls createSockets() in preparation to sending a Package command; Sends out the package using the ObjectOutputStream variable; The method waits for the result (String) which it received using the ObjectInputStream variable; The socket connection is closed and the result is being returned.
addPeople(Party) - Method in class server.ModelManager
Method used to add new participants to a Party object stored in the system; A Package object is being created with the command "addPeople" and the parameter is being added/attached to the Package; It then refers to the DatabaseConnectionTier2 variable that transmits the Package command for execution.
addPeople(Party) - Method in class server.PartyPlannerService
 
addPerson(Person) - Method in class domain.Package
Method that adds a person object to the List
addPerson(Package) - Method in class server.DatabaseConnectionTier2
 
addPerson(Party) - Method in class server.ModelManager
 
addString(String) - Method in class domain.Package
Adds a string object to the List
answerInvitation(Invitation) - Method in class server.ModelManager
Method used to change the status of an invitation stored in the system; A Package object is being created and the parameter is being added/attached to the Package; If the Invitation parameter status is "accepted", the Package command is set to "acceptInvite", and "declineInvite" otherwise; It then refers to the DatabaseConnectionTier2 variable that transmits the Package command for execution.
answerInvite(Package) - Method in class server.DatabaseConnectionTier2
Calls createSockets() in preparation to sending a Package command; Sends out the package using the ObjectOutputStream variable; The method waits for the result String which it received using the ObjectInputStream variable; The socket connection is closed and the result is being returned.
answerInvite(Invitation) - Method in class server.PartyPlannerService
Method to change the status of an invitation for joining a Party.
